widget.name: Searchable Reference Selector
widget.description: Mendix reference selector with a search bar and a clear button (Mendix 9)

property.caption: Selectable Objects
property.description: The objects that will be selectable in the dropdown

property.caption: Attribute to Display
property.description: The attribute that will be displayed in the dropdown

property.caption: Current Value
property.description: The attribute that will display in the widget if there is already a value set by the object

property.caption: On Select Association
property.description: This action is required. It should be a Microflow or Nanoflow that accepts an object of the Data Source. Have the action set the association with the value selected by the widget.

property.caption: Allow Empty Selection?
property.description: When true, the dropdown will have the first option as the No Selection Text.

property.caption: No Selection Text
property.description: Text shown if the association is empty.

property.caption: On Select Empty
property.description: This action is required. It should be a Microflow or Nanoflow that only accepts the data view's object. Have the action set the association as empty.
